mapper.select: select id, parent_id, path, component, icon, name, title, description, web_url, order_num, created_time, updated_time, created_by, updated_by, visible, menu_type from menu a group by id, parent_id, path, component, icon, name, title, description, web_url, order_num, created_time, updated_time, created_by, updated_by, visible, menu_type

select id, parent_id, path, component, icon, name, title, description, web_url, order_num, created_time, updated_time, created_by, updated_by, visible, menu_type from menu a where id in (select t3.menu_id from users t1 join user_role_relation t2 on t1.id = t2.user_id join role_menu_relation t3 on t2.role_id = t3.role_id where username = #{username}) group by id, parent_id, path, component, icon, name, title, description, web_url, order_num, created_time, updated_time, created_by, updated_by, visible, menu_type order by order_num

select id, parent_id, path, component, icon, name, title, description, web_url, order_num, created_time, updated_time, created_by, updated_by, visible, menu_type from menu a where id in (select menu_id from role_menu_relation where role_id = #{roleId}) group by id, parent_id, path, component, icon, name, title, description, web_url, order_num, created_time, updated_time, created_by, updated_by, visible, menu_type order by order_num
